items.name: Parsnip
items.description: A spring tuber closely related to the carrot. It has an earthy taste and is full of nutrients.

items.name: Green Bean
items.description: A popular garden plant. The young pods are crunchy and delicious.

items.name: Cauliflower
items.description: Valuable, but slow-growing. Despite its pale color, the florets are full of nutrients.

items.name: Potato
items.description: A brown tuber with excellent keeping qualities. Very versatile in cooking.

items.name: Kale
items.description: The waxy leaves are great for cooking. High in fiber and vitamins.

items.name: Garlic
items.description: Adds a wonderful flavor to dishes. High-quality garlic can be pretty spicy.

items.name: Rhubarb
items.description: The stalks are extremely tart, but make a great dessert when sweetened.

items.name: Strawberry
items.description: A sweet and juicy favorite with a hint of tartness.

items.name: Coffee Bean
items.description: Plant in spring or summer to grow a coffee plant. Harvested beans can be replanted. Place 5 in a Keg to make Coffee (150g).
items.notes: Self-seeding crop. Initial purchase from Traveling Cart costs 2500g, but harvested beans can be replanted for free.

items.name: Blue Jazz
items.description: The flower grows best in the cool spring air. It has a pleasant juniper-like smell.

items.name: Tulip
items.description: The colorful, cup-shaped flower has a very faint sweet scent.

items.name: Melon
items.description: A refreshing summer treat with a signature sweet flavor.

items.name: Tomato
items.description: Rich and slightly tangy, the tomato has a wide variety of culinary uses.

items.name: Hot Pepper
items.description: Fiery, with a hint of sweetness. Cooking with peppers is risky, rewarding.

items.name: Blueberry
items.description: A popular berry reported to have many health benefits. The blue skin has the highest nutritional value.

items.name: Corn
items.description: One of the most popular grains. The sweet, fresh cobs are a favorite summer treat.

items.name: Radish
items.description: A pungent root vegetable with red skin. Its spiciness is often underestimated.

items.name: Wheat
items.description: One of the most widely cultivated grains. Makes a fine flour.

items.name: Red Cabbage
items.description: Often used in salads and coleslaws. The color can range from purple to red.

items.name: Starfruit
items.description: An extremely juicy fruit that grows in hot, humid weather. Slightly sour with an underlying sweetness.

items.name: Hops
items.description: A bitter, tangy flower used to flavor beer.

items.name: Summer Spangle
items.description: A brilliant tropical flower with warm, vibrant colors.

items.name: Poppy
items.description: In addition to its delicate flower, the poppy has culinary and medicinal uses.

items.name: Pumpkin
items.description: A fall favorite, grown for its sweet flesh and seeds. Also makes a great decoration.

items.name: Eggplant
items.description: A rich, purple vegetable with a smooth, supple skin. Has a slightly bitter taste.

items.name: Amaranth
items.description: A brilliant fuchsia crop that makes a colorful addition to any dish.

items.name: Grape
items.description: A sweet cluster of fruit.

items.name: Yam
items.description: A starchy tuber with a pinkish hue.

items.name: Cranberries
items.description: These tart red berries are a traditional wintertime treat.

items.name: Artichoke
items.description: A leafy green vegetable with a slightly nutty taste.

items.name: Bok Choy
items.description: The tender leaves are a staple in stir fries.

items.name: Fairy Rose
items.description: An old villager's tale says that the weights of a Fairy Rose will bring good luck.

items.name: Sunflower
items.description: A sunny flower commonly seen in the summer. Can produce sunflower seeds when harvested.

items.name: Sweet Gem Berry
items.description: It's by far the sweetest thing you've ever smelled.

items.name: Ancient Fruit
items.description: It's been dormant for eons.

items.name: Pineapple
items.description: A tropical fruit with a tangy flavor.

items.name: Taro Root
items.description: This starchy root can be grown in wet or dry soil.

items.name: Pufferfish
items.description: Inflates when threatened.

items.name: Sturgeon
items.description: An ancient bottom-feeder with a streamlined body.

items.name: Lava Eel
items.description: It can somehow survive in pools of molten lava.

items.name: Legend
items.description: The king of all fish! They say he's been alive for eons.

items.name: Mutant Carp
items.description: The strange waters of the sewers have turned this carp into a monster.

items.name: Crimsonfish
items.description: Lives deep in the ocean but likes to come up to the surface.

items.name: Angler
items.description: Uses a luminescent dangler to attract prey.

items.name: Glacierfish
items.description: Builds its nest on the underside of glaciers.

items.name: Catfish
items.description: A whiskered bottom-feeder that feeds on small molluscs.

items.name: Octopus
items.description: A mysterious and intelligent creature.

items.name: Super Cucumber
items.description: A rare, purple variety of sea cucumber.

items.name: Truffle
items.description: A gourmet type of mushroom with a unique taste.

items.name: Morel
items.description: Sought after for its unique flavor.

items.name: Chanterelle
items.description: A delicious mushroom with a fruity smell.

items.name: Common Mushroom
items.description: Slightly nutty with good texture.

items.name: Purple Mushroom
items.description: A rare mushroom found deep in caves.

items.name: Diamond
items.description: A rare and valuable gem.

items.name: Ruby
items.description: A precious stone that is sought after for its luster and brilliant color.

items.name: Emerald
items.description: A precious stone with a brilliant green color.

items.name: Jade
items.description: A pale green ornamental stone.

items.name: Prismatic Shard
items.description: A very rare and powerful substance with unknown origins.

items.name: Large Milk
items.description: A large jug of cow's milk.

items.name: Large Egg
items.description: A large white egg.

items.name: Duck Egg
items.description: It's a bit larger than a chicken egg.

items.name: Goat Milk
items.description: The milk of a goat.

items.name: Large Goat Milk
items.description: A large jug of goat's milk.

items.name: Wool
items.description: Soft, fluffy wool.

items.name: Rabbit's Foot
items.description: Some say it's lucky.

items.name: Dinosaur Egg
items.description: A giant dino egg... The shell isite likeite'site!

items.name: Void Egg
items.description: A purplish egg from a very strange chicken.

items.name: Golden Egg
items.description: A dazzling, golden egg.

items.name: Ostrich Egg
items.description: The world's largest egg!

items.name: Milk
items.description: A jug of cow's milk.

items.name: Egg
items.description: A regular white egg.

items.name: Caviar
items.description: The cured roe of a Sturgeon fish. Considered a luxury item.

items.name: Aged Roe
items.description: Fish eggs aged in salt. Value varies by fish type. Base = 2x roe price + 60g.

items.name: Pale Ale
items.description: Drink in moderation.

items.name: Beer
items.description: A refreshing cold pint.

items.name: Mead
items.description: A fermented beverage made from honey. Drink in moderation.

items.name: Cheese
items.description: A slice of hard cheese.

items.name: Goat Cheese
items.description: Soft cheese made from goat's milk.

items.name: Mayonnaise
items.description: It looks delicious!

items.name: Duck Mayonnaise
items.description: It's a rich golden yellow.

items.name: Void Mayonnaise
items.description: A thick, black paste that smells like burnt hair.

items.name: Dinosaur Mayonnaise
items.description: It's thick and creamy with a vivid green hue. Probably not toxic.

items.name: Truffle Oil
items.description: A gourmet cooking ingredient.

items.name: Cloth
items.description: A bolt of fine wool cloth.

items.name: Honey
items.description: A sweet syrupy treat. Value varies by nearby flower type.

items.name: Fairy Honey
items.description: Honey infused with the essence of Fairy Rose flowers.

items.name: Coffee
items.description: A fragrant, bitter brew. Gives +1 Speed for 1:23.

items.name: Triple Shot Espresso
items.description: Gives +1 Speed for 4:12.

items.name: Maple Syrup
items.description: A sweet syrup with a unique flavor.

items.name: Oak Resin
items.description: A sticky substance with a characteristic scent.

items.name: Pine Tar
items.description: A pungent, antiseptic resin.

items.name: Sap
items.description: A sticky substance found inside trees.

items.name: Hardwood
items.description: A special type of wood with superior strength.

items.name: Wood
items.description: A sturdy, versatile building material.

items.name: Stone
items.description: A common material used for building.

items.name: Fiber
items.description: Raw plant fiber. Useful for crafting.

items.name: Coal
items.description: A smoldering heap of useful fuel.

items.name: Copper Ore
items.description: A common ore with many practical uses.

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description: A fairly common ore with many uses.

items.name: Gold Ore
items.description: A precious ore that can be smelted into bars.

items.name: Iridium Ore
items.description: An extremely rare and valuable ore.

items.name: Copper Bar
items.description: A bar of pure copper.

items.name: Iron Bar
items.description: A bar of pure iron.

items.name: Gold Bar
items.description: A bar of pure gold.

items.name: Iridium Bar
items.description: A bar of pure iridium.

items.name: Radioactive Bar
items.description: It emits a faint green glow.

items.name: Quartz
items.description: A fairly common mineral with many industrial uses.

items.name: Fire Quartz
items.description: A dangerousite when heated.

items.name: Frozen Tear
items.description: A crystal formed from frozen water.

items.name: Earth Crystal
items.description: A crystal formed from compressed earth.

items.name: Amethyst
items.description: A purple variety of quartz.

items.name: Aquamarine
items.description: A shimmery blue-green gem.

items.name: Topaz
items.description: A fairly common gem.

items.name: Spring Onion
items.description: Found wild in spring. Grows in the forest.

items.name: Daffodil
items.description: A cheerful spring flower.

items.name: Leek
items.description: A tasty relative of the onion.

items.name: Dandelion
items.description: Not actually a flower. It's a taproot vegetable.

items.name: Wild Horseradish
items.description: A spicy root found in spring.

items.name: Salmonberry
items.description: A berry found in spring. Has a light taste.

items.name: Spice Berry
items.description: Tastes peppery with a hint of sweetness.

items.name: Grape
items.description: A sweet summer fruit.

items.name: Sweet Pea
items.description: A fragrant summer flower.

items.name: Fiddlehead Fern
items.description: The young fronds have a distinctive coil pattern.

items.name: Red Mushroom
items.description: A poisonous mushroom. Handle with care.

items.name: Wild Plum
items.description: Found in the fall. Tangy and sweet.

items.name: Hazelnut
items.description: A nut wrapped in a leafy husk.

items.name: Blackberry
items.description: An intensely sweet berry.

items.name: Holly
items.description: The leaves and berries make a popular winter decoration.

items.name: Crystal Fruit
items.description: A delicate fruit that grows in winter.

items.name: Snow Yam
items.description: A starchy tuber that grows in winter.

items.name: Winter Root
items.description: A root grown in winter. Can be found by digging in snow.

items.name: Crocus
items.description: A flower that can survive even in winter.

items.name: Nautilus Shell
items.description: An intricate shell from a nautilus.

items.name: Rainbow Shell
items.description: It's extremely rare. The colors are beautiful.

items.name: Coconut
items.description: A versatile palm tree fruit.

items.name: Cactus Fruit
items.description: A sweet fruit from a prickly cactus.

items.name: Ginger
items.description: A spicy root used in many cuisines.

items.name: Magma Cap
items.description: A rare mushroom that thrives in volcanic temperatures.

items.name: Battery Pack
items.description: A charged battery. Useful for crafting.

items.name: Refined Quartz
items.description: A more pure form of quartz.

items.name: Oil
items.description: All-purpose cooking oil.

items.name: Sugar
items.description: Sweetens the flavor of any dish.

items.name: Wheat Flour
items.description: A finely ground flour made from wheat.

items.name: Rice
items.description: A versatile grain.

items.name: Vinegar
items.description: An acidic liquid used for cooking.

items.name: Geode
items.description: A rock that Clint can open for you.

items.name: Frozen Geode
items.description: A rock that contains frozen minerals.

items.name: Magma Geode
items.description: A geode formed from volcanic rock.

items.name: Omni Geode
items.description: A mysterious geode that could contain almost anything.

items.name: Golden Pumpkin
items.description: A valuable prize from the Spirit's Eve festival.

items.name: Pearl
items.description: A rare gem.

items.name: Strange Bun
items.description: What's inside? You have no idea.

items.name: Fried Egg
items.description: A basic breakfast staple.

items.name: Lucky Lunch
items.description: A special dish that increases luck (+3 Luck).

items.name: Spicy Eel
items.description: Increases speed and luck. (+1 Luck, +1 Speed)

items.name: Crab Cakes
items.description: Increases speed and defense. (+1 Speed, +1 Defense)

items.name: Dish o' The Sea
items.description: Boosts fishing skill. (+3 Fishing)

items.name: Seafoam Pudding
items.description: The best fishing food. (+4 Fishing)

items.name: Pumpkin Pie
items.description: A traditional fall dessert.

items.name: Banana
items.description: A tropical fruit with a creamy texture.

items.name: Mango
items.description: A sweet tropical stone fruit.

items.name: Qi Fruit
items.description: Mr. Qi's special request crop. Worth almost nothing.
